function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Insufficient sample data due to short time period and unknown infection rates","Impact":"Inaccurate estimation of exposed, asymptomatic, and symptomatic cases","Mitigation":"Extend the time period for data collection, consider wider range of estimates for incubation period","Technologies":"Data analytics, statistical modeling","People":"Population at risk, healthcare workers","Owner":"Health organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Large-scale detection program leading to underreporting of asymptomatic cases","Impact":"Underestimation of asymptomatic cases in genetic algorithm","Mitigation":"Revise algorithm to account for potential underreporting, adjust estimation parameters","Technologies":"Genetic algorithm, data analysis","People":"Research institutions, healthcare workers","Owner":"Health organizations, research institutions"}]}
